Selim's personal repository for debian-based distros

This repository contains packages of the open source software that I frequently use, mostly automatically pulled directly from the github release pages and crudely packed with dpkg-deb. Tested on Ubuntu 20.04 and nothing more.

To use this repository, populate your apt sources list and import the GPG key:

echo "deb http://deb.selim13.ru/repo/ sid main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/deb-selim13-ru.list
wget -qO - http://deb.selim13.ru/repo.gpg.key | sudo apt-key add -
  • docker-ctop 0.7.5-1 — Top-like interface for container metrics [arm64 amd64 arm32]
  • exa 0.9.0-1 — A modern replacement for ls [amd64]
  • fd 8.2.1 — Simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to find While fd does not seek to mirror all of find's powerful functionality, it provides sensible (opinionated) defaults for 80% of the use cases. [amd64 armhf i386]
  • fnm 1.23.2-8 — Fast and simple Node.js version manager, built in Rust [arm64 amd64 arm32]
  • gping 1.2.1-1 — Ping, but with a graph [amd64 arm64 arm32]
  • lando 3.0.26 — The best local dev in the galaxy. [amd64]
  • oha 0.4.4-2 — HTTP load generator, inspired by rakyll/hey with tui animation [amd64]
  • psysh 0.10.7-3 — A runtime developer console, interactive debugger and REPL for PHP [all]
  • ripgrep 12.1.1 — ripgrep is a line-oriented search tool that recursively searches your current directory for a regex pattern while respecting your gitignore rules. ripgrep has first class support on Windows, macOS and Linux. ripgrep (rg) recursively searches your current directory for a regex pattern. By default, ripgrep will respect your .gitignore and automatically skip hidden files/directories and binary files. [amd64]
  • starship 0.51.0-1 — The minimal, blazing-fast, and infinitely customizable prompt for any shell! [arm64 arm32 amd64 i386]
  • wp-cli 2.4.0-1 — WP-CLI framework [all]
